headline: Is Atmos Energy’s Price Justified After Regulatory News and a 27.5% Gain in 2025?
summary: Wondering if Atmos Energy's current share price is offering a bargain or if it's running too hot? You're not alone; getting the right read on value is on every investor's mind. The stock has edged up 0.7% in the last week and 1.7% over the past month, adding to a strong year-to-date gain of 27.5%. In recent news, industry discussion has focused on rising demand for natural gas utilities and regulatory developments impacting rates. Both factors have fueled optimism and caught the attention of...
